trans-unit.source: Base type for conditions used in filtering when searching for elements in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: 기본 요소에 대 한 검색 하는 경우 필터링에 사용 되는 조건에 대 한 형식에서 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"></xref> that always evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"> </xref> 항상로 평가 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This condition exists only for symmetry with <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
It will never enable a match with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, and it cannot usefully be combined with any other condition.
trans-unit.target: 일치 하는 사용 하도록 설정 하지는 것입니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소가 있으며, 유용 하 게 함께 사용할 수 없는 다른 조건입니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"></xref> that always evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"> </xref> 항상로 평가 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.
